ai-tha-ap95:1.1_0: “I give it to the Fortunate One,
ai-tha-ap95:1.2_0: Among the people who had given a share,
ai-tha-ap95:1.3_0: I’m now a swamped by wisdom.
ai-tha-ap95:1.4_0: merely by what is hard to take.
ai-tha-ap95:2.2_0: I’ll rejoice in heaven for an eon.’
ai-tha-ap95:3.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap95:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap95:3.4_0: as is the fruit of what is hard.
ai-tha-ap95:4.1_0: I’m for one wise and learned:
ai-tha-ap95:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Āḷaka.
ai-tha-ap95:7.1_0: Third to the third Elder Nun Creator
